oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show (KWTX) - 1946-09-13 (Tex Ritter special)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Hank Thompson radio show for KWTX, Waco, Texas (unconfirmed). Special broadcast featuring Tex Ritter, promoting his live show at the Waco Theater. Musicians include Coby Jones (vocals), Henry "Smudgie" Cedrone (accordion, unconfirmed), Spud Goodall (guitar, unconfirmed) and June.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson; Tex Ritter
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Brazos Valley Rancho) -- Announcer opening statement [incomplete] -- Hank Thompson introduces Tex Ritter -- Darling, What More Can I Do (Hank Thompson vocals) -- Tex Ritter introduces his musicians -- No One To Cry To (Coby Jones vocals) -- Long Time Gone (Tex Ritter vocals) -- Green Grow The Lilacs (Tex Ritter vocals) -- Tex Ritter talks about his tour -- We Live In Two Different Worlds (Tex Ritter vocals) -- Hank Thompson closing statement -- Theme (Brazos Valley Rancho) -- Announcer closing statement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Thompson, Hank; Ritter, Tex; White Flash; Pals Of The Prairie (Musical group); Mitchell, Frank, 1905-1991; Jones, Coby (Singer); Goodall, Spud; Cedrone, Henry Michael (Smudgie); KWTX (Radio station : Waco, Tex.)
